statements: SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data;
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_intensity > 10;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE acquisition_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_intensity > 50 ORDER BY carbon_intensity DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE source_location LIKE 'Europe%'
SELECT material_name, SUM(carbon_intensity) AS total_carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data GROUP BY material_name
SELECT material_name, acquisition_date FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(carbon_intensity) AS average_carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_intensity > 0;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_intensity < 0.5;
SELECT decision_id, material_id, decision_date FROM sourcing_decisions ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_footprint_data WHERE carbon_intensity > 5 ORDER BY material_name DESC;

SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity, decision_type FROM carbon_footprint_data JOIN sourcing_decisions ON carbon_footprint_data.material_id = sourcing_decisions.material_id WHERE carbon_intensity < 10 AND decision_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity, decision_date FROM carbon_footprint_data JOIN sourcing_decisions ON carbon_footprint_data.material_id = sourcing_decisions.material_id WHERE decision_type = 'sustainable' ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_intensity) AS avg_intensity FROM carbon_footprint_data;

SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM carbon_footprint_data JOIN sourcing_decisions ON carbon_footprint_data.material_id = sourcing_decisions.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM raw_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM raw_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM raw_materials WHERE carbon_intensity > 0.5;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM raw_materials JOIN carbon_footprint_data ON raw_materials.material_id = carbon_footprint_data.material_id JOIN suppliers ON carbon_footprint_data.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY material_name ASC, supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity FROM raw_materials;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers;
SELECT material_id, supplier_id, emission_amount, measurement_date FROM carbon_footprint_data;

SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity, supplier_name, location FROM raw_materials JOIN suppliers ON raw_materials.material_id = carbon_footprint_data.material_id AND suppliers.supplier_id = carbon_footprint_data.supplier_id;

SELECT material_name, carbon_intensity, supplier_name, location FROM raw_materials, suppliers, carbon_footprint_data WHERE raw_materials.material_id = carbon_footprint_data.material_id AND suppliers.supplier_id = carbon_footprint_data.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM RawMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 100.00;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM RawMaterials WHERE material_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY carbon_footprint ASC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT rs.material_name, s.supplier_name FROM RawMaterials rs INNER JOIN MaterialSuppliers ms ON rs.material_id = ms.material_id INNER JOIN Suppliers s ON ms.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT material_name, carbon_footprint FROM RawMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint > 50.00
SELECT supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name FROM RawMaterials m JOIN MaterialSuppliers ms ON m.material_id = ms.material_id JOIN Suppliers s ON ms.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM RawMaterials WHERE carbon_footprint BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00 ORDER BY material_name ASC

SELECT m.material_name, AVG(l.carbon_emission) AS avg_emission FROM RawMaterials m JOIN CarbonFootprintLog l ON m.material_id = l.material_id GROUP BY m.material_name HAVING AVG(l.carbon_emission) > 10.00
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT id, material_name, carbon_emission FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE carbon_emission > 100 ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
SELECT material_name, source_location FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE carbon_emission BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY source_location ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info FROM Supplier WHERE material_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SustainableSourcingDecisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData;
SELECT material_name, carbon_emission FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE carbon_emission > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_info, MaterialDetails.material_name FROM Supplier JOIN MaterialDetails ON Supplier.material_id = MaterialDetails.id;
SELECT source_location, MaterialDetails.material_name FROM CarbonFootprintData JOIN MaterialDetails ON CarbonFootprintData.material_name = MaterialDetails.material_name WHERE carbon_emission < 30;
SELECT * FROM CarbonFootprintData WHERE material_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY carbon_emission DESC;
